Eco-Friendly Hanger: A clothes hanger made from environmentally friendly materials such as bamboo or recycled plastic, which can be biodegradable and sustainable.

Hanger with Built-in Ironing Board: A hanger that has an adjustable ironing board built into its design, allowing users to iron their clothes directly on the hanger without needing to set up a separate ironing board.
Clothes Hanger with Built-in Scent Diffuser: A hanger that has a built-in scent diffuser, allowing users to add their favorite fragrance to their clothes as they hang them up to dry.
Hanger with Built-in LED Lighting: A hanger that has built-in LED lights that can be programmed to turn on and off, providing a soft glow that can be used for reading or other activities in the room.
Hanger with Built-in Folding Mechanism: A hanger that has a built-in folding mechanism that can help users fold their clothes neatly and efficiently, saving time and effort.
